observation: Welcome | tradecapital.pro | Bitcoin Investment | Cryptocurrency Investment | Ethereum Investment  Home Investment Plans Contact Us Legal information Sign up Log In Secured Yields for Crypto assets enthusiasts Build investment portfolios using Pre-IPOs and many more. Pay in convenient way, without limitations, and high entry thresholds! Sign UP Why choose tradecapital.pro Here are some of the many features that define our uniqueness. Reliable And Crisis-Proof tradecapital.pro has proven to be crisis resistant as its completely handled online and doesn't depend on human to human interaction. A profit generating investment business that works online, is not dependent on the economy and builds infrastructure for the new economy of tomorrow. Assured Profits A projected 5-20% pure profit – paid out every week or month, and with an interesting twist on our side; Should the yield drop below 7% for 7 consecutive days, your capital will be returned along with any accrued profits (if compounded). No fuss – no quibbling! Our Knowledge The team of technicians tradecapital.pro and the company's financial department monitor key cryptocurrency market trends. We are studying the processes of mining and search the system that will optimize costs and reduce net cost of Bitcoin. Instant Withdrawal Payout on tradecapital.pro are usually daily depend on the plan you choose or if you are compounding. Once your withdrawal request is approved we send the coins to the wallet address you provided. About tradecapital.pro tradecapital.pro  is a leading cryptocurrency investment company that issues debit cards and provides cryptocurrency trading. According to the research agency IBIS World, the debit card industry brought beneficiaries about $107 bln in revenue and $24 bln in net profit in 2020. The profit of our company is generated from the cost of additional debit card services and an annual service fee. Our company is officially registered in England, which gives us strategic advantages in the form of flexibility and transaction speed. Strong Protection We offer you an unbeatable interest on your investment within the shortest possible time 24/7 Support Our customer care service is available at all time to attend to you and also offer profitable advice on the best investment programs. Relability A huge number of people trust us. We constantly work on improving our system and level of our security to minimize any potential risks. How To Invest 1. Sign Up Create an account 2. Choose investment plan Go to the Deposit Page and in the Choose plan, choose the investment plan that you want to invest in. You will see offers with your selected plan. 3. Copy Address For Payment After fill all above doposit inputs, click deposit and copy wallet on the platform 4. Deposit Bitcoin Go to your wallet and deposit into the above copied address. 5. Wait for cormfirmation Our team will verify your payment and you investment will be automatically confirmed. 6. Receive Bitcoin DONE! We offer our investors great investment plans. Starter PLAN 10% after 15hours Min : $50 Max : $300 Referral Bonus : 5% Invest Now Diamond PLAN 25% after 24hrs Gold PLAN Min : $1,000 Max : $9999 Premium PLAN 100% after 48hrs Max : unlimited Promo PLAN Services List of solid services we provide for our customers Real estate investment Real estate investment involves the purchase, ownership, management, rental and/or sale of real estate for profit. Improvement of realty property as part of a real estate investment strategy is generally considered to be a sub-specialty of real estate investing called real estate development. Real estate is an asset form with limited liquidity relative to other investments (such as stocks or bonds that openly trade on financial markets). It is also capital intensive (although capital may be gained through mortgage leverage) and is highly cash flow dependent. Gold investment Golds are Commonly seen as a great store of wealth, this precious metal is also known as a reliable safe-haven asset. With a rich history amongst almost all global cultures, gold remains a highly popular investment. Although it has multiple uses, its primary function is typically to hedge against inflation in an often volatile futures market, as well as to diversify existing Precious Metals Investment Retirement Accounts. Gold has been one of the most valuable precious metals throughout human history, used by elites as a symbol of wealth for centuries due to its rarity and its ability to hold its worth for a long time. Historically, it has been the most common way to pass on one’s wealth as an inheritance from one generation to the next. Gold is considered a worthy investment, with coins and bars available for purchase in various sizes, ranging from one gram to a whopping 400 ounces. tradecapital.pro Loans To get a loan doesn’t have to be intimidating, with the right lender it can be a simple process. You only need a lender committed to taking the mystery out of the mortgage loan process! , we understand! Our investors want simple facts, honest answers and competitive products. DGS automatically offers loan services to investors with over $2,000 investment either in our normal financial Service packages or the company plans. Investors over $2,000 are entitled to loans of 6,000-$50,000 dollars yearly with 5% paid monthly, or the investor could wish to compound the interest till the time limit, provided all required information and identity of the investor are duly confirmed by Official company Administrator/management!

thought: The text extracted from the URL contains several red flags that align with the characteristics of scam websites: 1. It offers unusually high returns with guaranteed profits, which is generally not possible in legitimate investment scenarios. 2. The investment plans offer huge returns in a very short time frame, like 100% after 48 hours, which is unrealistic and targets human psychological weaknesses. 3. The company claims to be officially registered, but this information can be fabricated. I need to verify the legitimacy of the company. 4. The payment methods include cryptocurrencies, which can be considered unusual as they allow for less traceable transactions. I should now verify the legitimacy of the company and check for other scam characteristics.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain name is registered and the registrant's contact information is redacted for privacy, which is common. However, the domain was created recently, which can be a potential red flag since many scam websites are created and taken down within a short period to avoid detection. The address listed is in Chicago, Illinois, but previously the website claimed to be registered in the United Kingdom, which is inconsistent and suspicious. Given the high returns promised, the inconsistency in the location, and the recent domain registration, I should look for reviews or complaints about this website to see if others have reported it as a scam.

There are no results from Reddit, which could mean there is not much discussion or awareness of this website on that platform, or it might be too new to have generated any discussions. However, the lack of information on Reddit is not conclusive of the website's legitimacy. I need to try a different approach to gather more evidence.

There are no results from searching on Twitter, which could indicate that the website might not have a significant presence or discussion on this platform. This absence of information could be due to the site being new or not well-known, which aligns with the recent domain registration found in the WHOIS data. Additionally, the lack of discussion could also mean there are no notable reports of scam activity, but this alone isn't enough to determine the site's legitimacy. Given the red flags from the website's content and the recent domain registration, it would be prudent to check for any SSL certificate information to see if the website has a valid security certificate, which is a basic security feature expected from legitimate websites.

thought: The SSL certificate information shows that the website has a valid certificate issued by Let's Encrypt, a common certificate authority. The presence of an SSL certificate is a good sign, but it is not definitive proof of legitimacy, as many scam sites also use SSL certificates to appear more trustworthy. Given the information obtained from the WHOIS data, the content of the website, and the lack of significant online discussion or reviews, I believe I now have enough evidence to make an informed decision. I now know the final answer The URL https://tradecapital.pro/ is likely a scam website.

observation.reason: The website promises unusually high returns with guaranteed profits which is generally not possible in legitimate investment scenarios. It also offers huge returns in a very short timeframe targets human psychological weaknesses and uses payment methods that are less traceable. The company information is inconsistent with claims of being registered in the UK while WHOIS data shows a US address. Additionally the domain was recently created which is common for scam websites. The lack of online presence and discussion on platforms like Reddit and Twitter further supports the lack of legitimacy.
